headlines.headline: Stephen A.'s advice for Tatum: You're 27, whatâ€™s the rush to return?
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith says Jayson Tatum should protect his long-term future by not rushing his return for the Boston Celtics.

headlines.headline: JWill on Wemby reaching NBA Finals: 'Everybody wants it!'
headlines.description: Jay Williams and Alan Hahn weigh in on Victor Wembanyama and the young Spurs' chances of making it to the NBA Finals.

headlines.headline: Why the Lakers' success depends on Deandre Ayton -- and vice versa
headlines.description: Deandre Ayton and the Lakers are entering the most crucial stretch of the season. The question is: Will he accept the role they desperately need him to play?

headlines.headline: Stephen A. appalled Orlovsky doesn't have Mendoza as No. 1 pick
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith can't believe Dan Orlovsky doesn't have Fernando Mendoza as the No. 1 pick heading into the 2026 NFL draft.

headlines.headline: Sources: Jets trade Jermaine Johnson to Titans for T'Vondre Sweat
headlines.description: The Jets are trading pass rusher Jermaine Johnson to the Titans for defensive tackle T'Vondre Sweat, sources told ESPN.

headlines.headline: Remembering NFL combine standouts, how their careers panned out
headlines.description: Remember that guy with the ridiculous long jump? How about the one with the speedy 40-yard dash time? Let's look back, and update where they are now.

headlines.headline: Peter Schrager: It's cost-prohibitive for Eagles to trade A.J. Brown before June 1

headlines.description: The playoff races have restarted, with many teams seeking to bolster their rosters for a deep run this spring.

headlines.headline: How John Tavares' mental health focus has lifted his play
headlines.description: Through his foundation, the Maple Leafs center has driven awareness of the mental health conversation.
